name: Space Shooter Starter
description: Assets for a classic space shooter (shmup) with player ships, enemies, projectiles, power-ups, meteors, and particle effects

packs.reason: Player ships, enemies, lasers, meteors, power-ups, and UI elements (variable sizes on 1024x1024 atlas)
Explosion particles, muzzle flashes, smoke trails, and visual effects (512x512 individual PNGs)

player_ship.notes: Main player ship (99x75px); variants: ship1-green/orange/red, ship2-*, ship3-*

player_ship_damaged.notes: Heavily damaged player ship; damage levels: damage-1 (light), damage-2 (medium), damage-3 (heavy)

enemy_small.notes: Small enemy ship (82x84px); smallest of the enemy set

enemy_medium.notes: Medium enemy ship (93x84px); variants in black/blue/green/red colors

enemy_large.notes: Large enemy ship (104x84px); most imposing standard enemy

bullet_player.notes: Player laser bolt (9x54px); many variants available for different weapon types

bullet_enemy.notes: Enemy laser bolt (9x54px); red for visual distinction from player

missile.notes: Missile/heavy projectile (13x57px); larger projectile for special weapons

laser.notes: Continuous laser beam (15x67px); for charged/beam weapons

explosion_frame_1.notes: Explosion frame 1 of sequence; use fire-00 through fire-19 for animation

explosion_particle.notes: Large explosion particle (512x512px); scale down as needed

muzzle_flash.notes: Weapon muzzle flash (512x512px); use rotated variants for different angles

smoke_trail.notes: Smoke particle for trails (512x512px); variants smoke-01 through smoke-10

asteroid.notes: Large asteroid (101x84px); variants in brown/grey, sizes: big/med/small/tiny

background_planet.notes: Circular shape for planets (512x512px); tint/scale as needed for distant planets

shield_effect.notes: Shield bubble effect (133x108px); overlay on ship when shield active

engine_flame.notes: Engine exhaust flame (49x45px); attach behind ship

spark.notes: Impact spark particle (512x512px); for bullet hits

gameplayNotes: Player ships come in 3 styles (ship1/2/3) with 4 colors each; ship1-blue has damage state sprites
Enemies are numbered 1-5 by size, with color variants (black/blue/green/red); UFOs serve as bosses
Lasers come in blue (player), red (enemy), and green (special); multiple shapes available
Meteors come in brown/grey colors and big/med/small/tiny sizes for variety
Fire sprites (fire-00 to fire-19) can be sequenced for explosion animations
Particle pack sprites are 512x512px - scale down significantly for in-game use
Power-ups use bolt (weapon), shield, and star icons with color variants
Engine and wing parts can be combined to create custom ship designs
Shield-effect sprites overlay on ship to show active shield state
